snippet.title: Heroes of Dragon Age - Now Available!
snippet.description:
Heroes of Dragon Age is now available on Google Play, iPad, iPhone and iPod touch! Build a party of epic warriors and monsters from Dragon Age lore and bring them to life in strategic 3D combat -- for FREE. Summon your heroes today!

iOS: http://smarturl.it/HoDAiOS 
GP: http://smarturl.it/HoDAGP
